package.shortDescription: Professional AR image tracking and texture capture system for interactive coloring book experiences.
package.longDescription:
Transform your Unity projects into interactive AR coloring books with Felina AR Coloring Book. This professional-grade package provides advanced image tracking, real-time texture capture with GPU-accelerated unwarp, and seamless content spawning.

Key Features:
• ARFoundation-based multi-platform support (iOS ARKit, Android ARCore)
• Advanced homography-based texture unwarp for high-quality scans
• Quality-based auto-capture with configurable thresholds
• Device stability detection for optimal capture timing
• Zero-allocation MaterialPropertyBlock texture updates
• Performance-optimized for mobile devices
• Custom editor inspectors for streamlined workflow
• Native C++ plugin for performance-critical operations

Perfect for:
• Educational AR coloring book apps
• Interactive marketing experiences
• Art and creativity applications
• Museums and exhibitions
• Children's entertainment apps

Technical Highlights:
• Singleton pattern with event-driven architecture
• NativeArray usage for efficient memory management
• Smart RenderTexture format detection
• Frame-based camera feed caching
• Extensible IARBridge interface for custom implementations

Includes:
• Complete source code
• Sample scene with setup guide
• Native plugins for Windows/macOS/iOS/Android
• Comprehensive documentation
• Email support
package.technicalDetails:
• Unity 2022.3 or later
• AR Foundation 5.0+
• ARKit XR Plugin 5.0+ (iOS)
• ARCore XR Plugin 5.0+ (Android)
• Unity Mathematics 1.2.6+
• C# 9.0, .NET Framework 4.7.1
• Native C++ plugin (included)

pricing.notes: Single-seat license. Each developer requires a license. Unlimited projects per license.
